idea:
IMDS’ SOLUTIONS PRIVATE LIMITED is a young and energetic ‘InsureTech’ company incorporated by general insurance industry professionals in 2017.


The principle objective of the company is to build a digital infrastructure through which various stake holders of the insurance sector namely – Insured, Intermediaries & Insurers – can collaborate and transact business online. 

With the deep domain understanding, the company has completed development of a web based configurable application that automates Quote & Policy Issuance of Standard Fire & Special Perils & Industrial All Risk - of any complexity.

We are developing similar capabilities for all the other commercial line products such as Marine, Engineering, Health, Liability & Specialty in with the assistance from the ‘Thought Leaders’ of the industry.

We have recently won our first client and are all excited to deploy our solution in the real world!
